title: Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 Full Burst {PC}
description:
HOW TO RUN IT:
Run the setup as admin.
Replace the files in install location with the files in Crack folder.
Run settings app as admin, and set the keyboard config.
Run game as admin and play c:



Game: Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3

Platform: PC

Alias: Naruto Shippuden: Narutimate Storm 3

Release date: 05 March 2013
 
Languages: English , Japanese

Summary:
Ultimate Ninja STORM 3 promises to unleash a tornado of ninja action and adventure that the franchise is known for, with over eighty playable characters, advanced online modes and enhanced fighting mechanics that allow anyone to become a ninja 
master.

(Will upload UNS4 soon)

Naruto ShippÃ…Â«den: Ultimate Ninja Storm 3 is a game developed by CyberConnect2 and published by Namco-Bandai games for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. It was released on March 8th 2013 in Europe, March 5th in North America, and was released on April 18th in Japan. An enhanced editi
on called "Full Burst" was released on October 24th 2013 for PC and Steam. The game starts with a flashback from the beginning of the Nine-Tails' Attack on Konoha and then starts with the Five Kage Summit arc, ending with an alternate turn of events in the Fourth Shinobi World War. In Europe, the game is available in a "Will of Fire Edition" and "True Despair Edition"
